Output Conditioner¶

class output_obj.output_container(output, mode)¶
__init__(output, mode) → None¶

__init__ Initializes output container object.

Parameters

  • output (PWMIO.PWMOUT) – The pin to output to

  • mode (int) – Value from 0-3

update_mode(mode) → None¶

update_mode Updates mode of the controller

Parameters

mode (int) – Value from 0-3

value(input)¶

value Updates values of the output pin

Parameters

input (float) – Value from 0-100
